content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia, nice to meet you. I appreciate your interest in my apartment. What rental price are you willing to pay for the 25 square meter apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I want to know if you have any other apartments to show me or if you have any other prices to offer for this apartment.

Thanks for your time.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia, I appreciate your interest in my apartment. Unfortunately, I only have this one available at the moment. However, I am open to negotiating the rental price to ensure that both parties are satisfied. What rental price are you willing to pay for the 25 square meter apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am willing to pay 500 Euros per month.

Thanks for your time.

I would like to accept the price of 500 Euros per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia, I appreciate your willingness to pay 500 Euros per month for the 25 square meter apartment. I am happy to accept that rental price. Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns before signing the lease agreement.
name: Heinrich Heine
